1. Moroccan fly maggot uses fake face on its butt to infiltrate termite colony  Livescience.com
  2. This Fly Larva’s Butt Looks Like a Termite’s Head—and Termites Are Falling for It  Gizmodo
  3. Rare fly species wears fake termite head to infiltrate nests  Popular Science
  4. Fly larva with a fake termite face can infiltrate termite mounds and socialize  Phys.org
  5. Extremely rare fly maggots now have fake faces on their BOOTY and it serves as a surprise weapon...  The Sun
